text: Steven Orville "Steve" Williams (born May 24, 1951) is an American politician and current judge in Fairfield County, Ohio. He formerly served as the state Senator of the 31st District, from 1991 to 1993.Profile, fairfieldcountyprobate.com; accessed November 7, 2014. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Ohio state senators Category:Ohio Republicans Category:Members of the Ohio House of Representatives Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Columbus, Ohio Category:People from Fairfield County, Ohio
title: Steve Williams (politician)
